original_title: Rihanna: Loud Tour Live At The O2
overview: LOUD TOUR LIVE AT THE O2 is a 90 minutes-plus chronicle of Rihanna’s sold-out show at the legendary London venue, the climactic final stop of her 2011 world tour.  Featured are 21 performances including the #1 hits “We Found Love,” “Only Girl (In the World),” “S&M,” “What’s My Name,” “Rude Boy,” “Umbrella,” “Love the Way You Lie,” and many more.  The production, costumes and stage design which Rihanna’s fans have come to expect, all come through in this larger-than-life video and audio experience.  Also featured is never before released behind-the-scenes footage of life on the road with Rihanna during that summer and fall “LOUD Tour” of 2011.
title: Rihanna: Loud Tour Live At The O2
